verbs.description: [ARG1: suspicious letters] [V: sent] [ARG2: to white house pentagon campus ted cruz office] at least two envelopes found monday inside a mail processing center on the pentagon campus are suspected to contain ricin according to initial testing officials tell nbc news white house centers for disease control and prevention pentagon force protection agency nbc secret service pentagon campus sen ted cruz pentagon ted cruz col robert manning iii official col robert manning iii department of defense houston fire department nbc news president donald trump united states secret service
